data.title: Pomfret School
data.text:
Given in memory of Morgan Wing, Jr. ’29, The Morgan Wing Bowl is awarded annually in three categories to those Class Agents–Free Agents and Classes with ten or more living members, achieving the highest percentage of participation in the Pomfret Fund.

Classes with 10–44 Classmates

Class of 1953 with 80 percent participation

Class Agent: Frederick K. Gaston III

Classes with 45–74 Classmates

Class of 1983 with 40 percent participation

Class Agents: Wendy R. Enelow and Timothy T. Robinson
